metadata.title: CVE-2022-40898 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue discovered in Python Packaging Authority (PyPA) Wheel 0.37.1 andearlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via attackercontrolled input to wheel cli.

criterions.comment: wheel: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
python-pip: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
